channel.title: OS-Relapse 317 || Blowpipe || Economy || Oldschool
channel.description:
[center][size=64pt][img]http://i.imgur.com/7obSR52.png[/img][/size]
OS-Relapse is an old school private server based on economy through skilling aswell as pvm and pvp. we do not target one faction of players we are welcoming to all. we are currently in a beta stage and looking to expand to grab a slightly larger player base for the moment to allow us to fine tune the server to the way it deserves to be!
Currently featuring a very stable economy we are looking to test it by implementing a small amount of game time running the server for a few months and watching the problems get flushed out. as everyone knows, with players come problems and thats what we want.
Highly active developer with 24/7 up time allows the maximum amount of fun!
we currently have working bounty hunter, full gwd, all OSRS items, and 4 different speeds of playing ranging from the pker friendly very fast training mode to the slower more advanced style of play for the pro players. near daily updates with the intention of finishing this project as soon as possible please come help us!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------[url=http://spartin964.wix.com/os-relapse]Website[/url]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------[url=http://osrelapse.createaforum.com/index.php]Forums[/url]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------[url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93536668/OS-Relapse%20V1.jar]Client[/url]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wQ5y3Jk.png[/img]
PLAY ON 4 DIFFERENT PLAY MODES WITH BETTER DROP RATES THE HARDER YOU CHOOSE. READ MORE [url=http://osrelapse.createaforum.com/server-updates/41415-play-modes/]HERE[/url]
MEDIA [img]http://i.imgur.com/CSdm6Gd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iKuwL0Y.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tmZB1s0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Tt3cykk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VhnfvZQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ehcpskn.png[/img]
Chisled armor, works similar to torva, increasing max HP to 139
also a few other items in that inventory with special effects, new gear to learn and implement on your favorite bosses
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eHgvFe9.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: OS-Relapse 317 || Blowpipe || Economy || Oldschool
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

Welliton_inc:

I like the concept. but why is the spined helmet called “chisled helmet”?

great question!

because its what i call a half custom.

basically take an existing item, rename it and give it some sort of an effect or make it special in some way.

it looks a lot cleaner than custom. plus customs can also effect the quality of the colors in other items and stuff in the long run when you have too many. its just cleaner all around. plus who doesnt like to see something completely useless get to be an all star once in awhile

Read full topic
